00115 #include <HashTable.h>
00116 #include <strings.h>
00117 #include <stdlib.h>
00118 #include <string.h>
00119 #include "shell_vars.h"
00120 #include "stuff_alloc.h"
00121 
00122 /* variable struct */
00123 typedef struct shell_variable__ {  
00124   char var_name[MAX_VAR_LEN]; 
00125   char * var_value; /* mallocated */
00126   int datalen;
00127   struct shell_variable__ * next;
00128   struct shell_variable__ * prev;
00129 } shell_variable_t;
00130 
00131 
00132 /* threads keys */
00133 static pthread_key_t thread_key ;
00134 static pthread_once_t once_key = PTHREAD_ONCE_INIT ;
00135 
00136 
00137 /* init pthtread_key for current thread */
00138 
00139 static void init_keys( void )
00140 {
00141   if( pthread_key_create( &thread_key, NULL ) == -1 )
00142     printf( "Error %d creating pthread key for thread %p : %s\n",
00143         errno,(caddr_t)pthread_self(),strerror(errno) ) ;
00144   
00145   return ;
00146 } /* init_keys */
00147 
00148 
00152 static shell_variable_t * GetVarTable(){
00153   
00154   int i;
00155   shell_variable_t * p_current_thread_vars ;
00156   
00157   
00158   /* first, we init the keys if this is the first time */
00159   if( pthread_once( &once_key, init_keys ) != 0 ){
00160     printf( "Error %d calling pthread_once for thread %p : %s\n",
00161         errno,(caddr_t)pthread_self(),strerror(errno) ) ;
00162     return NULL;
00163   }
00164   
00165   return (shell_variable_t *)pthread_getspecific( thread_key );
00166     
00167 }/* GetVarTable */
00168 
00169 
00170 void SetVarTable( shell_variable_t * var_table )
00171 {
00172   /* set the specific value */
00173   pthread_setspecific( thread_key , var_table ) ;
00174 
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 
00182 void print_varlist( FILE * output, int is_dlen )
00183 {  
00184   shell_variable_t * current = GetVarTable();
00185   while ( current ){    
00186     if (is_dlen) fprintf(output, "\t%s (%d Bytes)\n",
00187                         current->var_name,
00188                         current->datalen - 1 );
00189     else fprintf(output, "\t%s\n",current->var_name);
00190     current =   current -> next;     
00191   }
00192   return;
00193 }
00194 
00195 
00196 static  shell_variable_t * find_var(char * str){  
00197   shell_variable_t * current = GetVarTable();
00198   while ( current ){
00199     if (!strncmp( current->var_name , str, MAX_VAR_LEN))
00200       return current;
00201     current = current -> next;
00202   }
00203   return NULL;  
00204 }
00205 
00206 static  shell_variable_t * create_var( char * str ){
00207   
00208   int dlen;
00209   shell_variable_t * var_table = GetVarTable();
00210   
00211   /* remembers name */
00212   shell_variable_t * new_item =
00213       (shell_variable_t *)Mem_Alloc(sizeof(shell_variable_t));
00214   strncpy(new_item->var_name,str,MAX_VAR_LEN);
00215   
00216   new_item->var_value = NULL;
00217   new_item->datalen = 0;
00218   
00219   /* inserting */
00220   if (var_table) var_table->prev = new_item;  
00221   new_item->next = var_table;
00222   new_item->prev = NULL;
00223   SetVarTable( new_item );
00224   
00225   return  new_item;
00226 }
00227 
00228 static  void set_var( shell_variable_t * var , char * value ){
00229   
00230   int dlen;
00231   
00232   /* clears old value, if any */
00233   if (var->var_value){
00234     Mem_Free(var->var_value);
00235     var->var_value=NULL;
00236     var->datalen=0;
00237   }
00238   
00239   /* alloc and set new value */
00240   dlen = strlen(value)+1;
00241   var->datalen = dlen;
00242   var->var_value = (char*)Mem_Alloc(dlen);
00243   strncpy(var->var_value, value, dlen);
00244       
00245 }
00246 
00247 static void del_var( shell_variable_t * var){
00248   
00249   /* remove from the list */
00250   
00251   if (var->prev){
00252     var->prev->next = var->next;
00253   } else {
00254     SetVarTable( var->next );
00255   }
00256     
00257   if (var->next){
00258     var->next->prev = var->prev;
00259   }
00260   
00261   /* free */
00262   if (var->var_value)
00263     Mem_Free(var->var_value);
00264   
00265   Mem_Free((caddr_t)var);
00266   
00267 }
00268 
00269 #define IS_LETTER(_c_) (((_c_) >= 'a') && ((_c_) <= 'z'))
00270 #define IS_LETTER_CAP(_c_) (((_c_) >= 'A') && ((_c_) <= 'Z'))
00271 #define IS_NUMERIC(_c_) (((_c_) >= '0') && ((_c_) <= '9'))
00272 
00276 int is_authorized_varname(char * str){
00277   
00278   int len=0;
00279   
00280   /* special var $? */
00281   if ( !strcmp( str, "?" ) ) return 1;
00282   
00283   while(str[len])
00284   {    
00285     char c = str[len];
00286     if ( !IS_LETTER(c)      &&
00287          !IS_LETTER_CAP(c)  &&
00288          !IS_NUMERIC(c)     &&
00289          (c!= '.')          &&
00290          (c!= '_')          &&
00291          (c!= ':'))
00292     {      
00293       return 0;      
00294     }
00295     
00296     len++;
00297     if (len>MAX_VAR_LEN) return 0;
00298   }
00299   
00300   return 1;
00301     
00302 }
00303 
00304 
00308 char * get_var_value(char * varname){  
00309   shell_variable_t * var;
00310   if (var = find_var(varname))
00311   {
00312     return var->var_value;
00313   } else {
00314     return NULL;
00315   }
00316 }
00317 
00321 int set_var_value(char * varname, char * var_value)
00322 {
00323   shell_variable_t * var;
00324   /* if the value doesn't exist, create it */
00325   if (!(var = find_var(varname))){    
00326     var=create_var( varname );
00327   }
00328   if (!var) return 1;  
00329   set_var(var,var_value);
00330   
00331   return 0;
00332     
00333 }
00334 
00337 int free_var(char * varname){
00338 
00339   shell_variable_t * var;
00340   /* if the value doesn't exist, error */
00341   if (!(var = find_var(varname))){
00342     return 1;
00343   }
00344   
00345   del_var(var);
00346   return 0;
00347   
00348 }
